content: Moderators on that site seem to want to silence people calling outMarket manipulation being illegal. Pump and dumps are ILLEGALI think they want to shift the narrative that these things aren't considered "fraud" because they're "unregulated".Just because you figured out a new way to commit fraud doesn't mean you're extempt from the already broad laws regarding this.
